data.eml:eml: A new species of Furculanurida (Collembola: Neanuridae) from Ivory Coast, with comments on related genera

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zon, Serge Demeango, Tano, Yao, Deharveng, Louis (2014): A new species of Furculanurida (Collembola: Neanuridae) from Ivory Coast, with comments on related genera. Zootaxa 3878 (5): 491-497, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3878.5.8
